snippet: As he faces Juan Manuel Marquez on Saturday for the fourth time, Manny Pacquiao, 33, may be on the cusp of a moment all boxers experience — the realization that it’s no longer wise to keep going.
abstract: Manny Pacquiao, preparing to face Juan Manuel Marquez for the fourth time, may be on the cusp of a moment all boxers experience--the realization that his career has peaked; Pacquiao, who is 33, has become more consumed with politics and family, and no longer exhibits the unbridled aggression that made him famous years earlier.
lead_paragraph: As he faces Juan Manuel Marquez on Saturday for the fourth time, Manny Pacquiao, 33, may be on the cusp of a moment all boxers experience — the realization that it’s no longer wise to keep going.

headline.seo: Manny Pacquiao Faces a Fight Against Time
headline.main: Pacquiao, Like All Boxers, Is in Fight Against Time
